snippet: A charmer with a documentary feel, this film follows a man’s return to Buenos Aires to reconnect with his father in a bustling Jewish neighborhood....
abstract: Ben Kenigsberg reviews movie The Tenth Man, directed by Daniel Burman and starring Alan Sabbagh.
lead_paragraph: A charmer with a documentary feel, this film follows a man’s return to Buenos Aires to reconnect with his father in a bustling Jewish neighborhood.

headline.main: Review: In ‘The Tenth Man,’ Contending With a Father and a Traditional Upbringing
